page.title: 02Bicknoller Village
page.content: In{Bicknoller}there are many narrow roads which cut the village up into triangles. There are lots of old{houses}made out of{stone}and there are some that are made out{of cob with thatch}on the roof. Many of them have small front {gardens}with lots of flowers, some climbing up the wall with their blossoms on the trees. It is coloured very brightly and looks attractive. There is a{stream}that runs through Bicknoller. The{church}is called St.Georges and in the grave yard there are some stocks.Outside the church there is a big tree sheltering a bench and table. A few of the houses are modern. There is a car park and round it are bungalows for old people.There is one pub in Bicknoller. There is a Post Office in a converted garage.
